name: kepler-dashboard
description: Exoplanet Discovery Dashboard with ML Backend

scripts.dev:backend: bash -c "cd backend && source venv/Scripts/activate && uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000"
scripts.start:backend: bash -c "cd backend && source venv/Scripts/activate && uvicorn app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000"
scripts.test:backend: bash -c "cd backend && source venv/Scripts/activate && python -m pytest"
scripts.install:backend: bash -c "cd backend && source venv/Scripts/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt"
scripts.setup: yarn install && yarn install:frontend && yarn install:backend
